CheckTitle: Check if API Gateway Stage has a WAF ACL attached.
Description: Check if API Gateway Stage has a WAF ACL attached.
Risk: Potential attacks and / or abuse of service, more even for even for internet reachable services.

Recommendation.Text: Use AWS WAF to protect your API Gateway API from common web exploits, such as SQL injection and cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks. These could affect API availability and performance, compromise security or consume excessive resources.
